content: ❗️❗️❗️ free youtube tutorial + the best price & more always on my website https //loopsonly com/products/granny-groove-dress the granny stitch dress was born from a simple idea turn leftover yarn into something joyful instead of letting scraps pile up in a basket this design transforms them into a colorful flowy dress you ll want to wear again and again worked seamlessly from the top down in raglan style it s one piece from start to finish no seaming no complicated shaping the granny stitch makes it quick and rhythmic to crochet while also letting colors shine whether you re mixing a stash of shades or working it in a single tone for a softer look the silhouette is light and airy with a gentle bell shape at the hem perfect for layering over tights jeans or leggings it s comfortable enough for everyday wear and versatile enough for all seasons
